DOC.brief_summary: The study will examine the prevalence of venous thromboembolism in children with acute lymphoblastic leukaemia treated in accordance with NOPHO ALL-2008. The investigators will prospectively study clinical symptomatic thromboses, asymptomatic central line-associated thromboses, and infections.
DOC.brief_title: Thromboembolic Complications Related to Asparaginase in Children With Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia (ALL) Treated According to NOPHO ALL 2008
DOC.criteria: Acute lymphoblastic leukaemia, Age 1 year to 16 years old, Central line, Protocol NOPHO ALL 2008. Refusal of participation, Treated according to protocol other than NOPHO ALL 2008.
